The Pwani University Christian Union is a body bound by one faith in God, the unity based on a common belief in the LORD JESUS as Saviour and living as the Holy Scriptures say. The CU is entirely non-political and non-profit.


Objectives
 1. Evangelism
 To present JESUS CHRIST as Saviour, LORD and God to students in the University to lead them to personal faith in Him.


2. Discipleship
 To deepen and strengthen the spiritual life of students and equip them for a lifetime of service in the family, church and society.


3. Mission
 To encourage and equip students to take the good news of Christ to every nation on Earth and to be part of the church's witness to the good news, to be salt and Light in the World.


4. Leadership Development
 To develop Christian leaders who will play key roles while on-campus, in church and wider society.

The Pwani University Christian Union is a body bound by one faith in God, the unity based on a common belief in the LORD JESUS as Saviour and living as the Holy Scriptures say. The CU is entirely non-political and non-profit.


Objectives
 1. Evangelism
 To present JESUS CHRIST as Saviour, LORD and God to students in the University to lead them to personal faith in Him.


2. Discipleship
 To deepen and strengthen the spiritual life of students and equip them for a lifetime of service in the family, church and society.


3. Mission
 To encourage and equip students to take the good news of Christ to every nation on Earth and to be part of the church's witness to the good news, to be salt and Light in the World.


4. Leadership Development
 To develop Christian leaders who will play key roles while on-campus, in church and wider society.


STATEMENT OF FAITH
 1. The unity of the Father, Son and the Holy Spirit in God's head.
 2. The Sovereignty of God in Creation, revolution, redemption and final judgement. 
 3. The divined inspiration and entire trustworthiness of Holy Scripture, as originally given and its supreme authority in all matters of faith and conduct.
 4. The universal sinfulness and guilt of all men since the Fall, rendering them subject to God's wrath and condemnation.
 5. Redemption from the guilt, penalty, dominion and pollution of solely through the sacrificial death \(Our Representative and substitution\) of the; LORD JESUS from the dead and His ascension to the right hand.
But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure; then peace-loving , considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit, impartial and sincere.
The model of Godly Transformation to Church and society
Do you want to Save Contact or Call Pwani University Christian Union Directly?
Save the contact First to text Pwani Pwani University Christian Union in WhatsApp.
Thank you Lord God Almighty. Amen.

string-array.name: help_me
string-array.item: Today\n Developed for personal daily devotion. Each day, while online you can view a daily devotion to nourish your Spiritual Being.
Notices\n Provides the current notices from the CU Desk to keep the members ever updated on the CU program.
Semester Program\n Provides a detailed list of activities organised by the CU for the whole semester. Today activity will be highlighted in Blue.

About CU\n Displays the Vision, Mission and Statement of faith of the Pwani University Christian Union as well as the objectives of the Union. The Read More button at the bottom, when clicked, allows you to access the CU Website directly.
Theme Verse\n Provides the Theme Verses of the Current semester as well as Theme verses of the past Years and Semester.

Bible Study Registration\n Allows members to register Bible study Online from the link to the google form provided every semester. The form is then closed once the application time is over. Members are encouraged to register and register on time.
Social Media\n Provides our Social Media Account and Phone numbers that can be used to communicate with us.
Forum\n This screen provides a platform for members to engage each other, exchange ideas to the growth of us all spiritually.
